name: Quick Stow (Ratfolk)
summary: You are adept at quickly moving items into your cheek pouches.
description:
You are adept at quickly moving items into your cheek pouches. You Interact to store one held item in your cheek pouches (provided it fits).Traits

Ratfolk: A creature with this trait is a member of the ratfolk ancestry. Ratfolk are humanoids who resemble rats. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by ratfolk.
